title.rendered: Air Arabia Ticket Office in Safeer Mall, Sharjah, UAE

content.rendered:
Air Arabia was established in 3 February 2003 and commenced operations in 28 October 2003 which is a low-cost airline. Air Arabia has headquartered in the Sharjah Freight Center, Sharjah International Airport, in Sharjah, United Arab Emirates.

The airline operates scheduled services to 51 destinations in the Middle East, North Africa, the Indian subcontinent, Central Asia and Europe to 22 countries from Sharjah, 28 destinations in 9 countries from Casablanca, Fez, Nador and Tangier, 11 destinations in 8 countries from Ras Al Khaimah, and 6 destinations in 4 countries from Alexandria.

 

Air Arabia Safeer Mall, Sharjah Ticket Office Address:
Safeer Mall Sharjah
Ground Floor , Alittihad Road

Phone: (06) 5525577

Map: View direction here

Nearby Landmark for Air Arabia Office in Sharjah: Safeer Mall

Location: Air Arabia is located in Alittihad Road in Sharjah

Air Arabia Ticket Office telephone contact numbers:
00971-6-5525577

Email:

Working hours
Map

Air Arabia Official website: www.airarabia.com

View location of Air Arabia Safeer Mall, Sharjah, UAE on google maps

Air Arabia Check-in

Air Arabia Check-in: www.airarabia.com/onlinecheckin

Note: If you are flying from Sharjah, online check-in will be open 24 hours prior to departure. If your departure is from other airports, online check-in will be open 12 hours prior to departure time.

Check Air Arabia flight schedule here: www.airarabia.com/flightschedule

Check Air Arabia flight status here: www.airarabia.com/flightstatus

Air Arabia baggage services telephone contact numbers:
00971-6-5525577

Trace your baggage in Air Arabia: Air Arabia-Trace baggage

Air Arabia Missed Flights:

Passengers who miss their Air Arabia flights would not be able to use / reschedule the ticket. They have to purchase a new ticket

Air Arabia Baggage Allowance

View Air Arabia Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Near-by Airports: Sharjah International Airport,  Dubai World Central-Al Maktoum International Airport, Abu Dhabhi International Airport (AUH), Fujairah International Airport (FJR), Al Bateen International Airport (AZI), Dubai International Airport (DXB)

Nearby Air Arabia office in UAE:

View the nearest Air Arabia offices in UAE and the address, phone number, website and more.

  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Fujairah, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Lamcy Plaza, Dubai, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Mina Road, Sharjah, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Oman Road Nakheel, Ras Al Khaima, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Safeer Mall, Sharjah, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Sharjah Industrial area, Sharjah, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Sharjah, UAE
  • Air Arabia Ticket Office in Town centre, Fujairah, UAE

List of Air Arabia offices

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Arabia

Total fleet: 36

  • Airbus A320-200
Queries handled by Air Arabia Customer care:
Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, AIRewards

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Arabia Safeer Mall, Sharjah Ticket Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Arabia Safeer Mall, Sharjah Ticket Office in UAE: (click on the stars below)
